com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Class FrameBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.graphics.FrameBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bindable, Cleanable

    public class FrameBuffer
extends Object
implements Cleanable, Bindable
    An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for end-processing effects.
    Author:
    wessles, Sri Harsha Chilakapati
